summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: V5-28, COLOR: WHITE. SIZE: 2XL. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17E015000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 866-371-0281 IN JULY ON FOUR DIFFERENT OCCASIONS. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT THERE WAS NO RESPONSE. IN ADDITION, THE CONTACT SENT AN E-MAIL TO TEGOLRECALL@GMAIL.COM, BUT NO RESPONSE WAS PROVIDED. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
